title: Community Benchmarks: December
summary: See how the new update performs on different hardware configurations submitted by our community members.

content.paragraph:
All benchmarks were conducted using [GamerPotion's FPS Tester world](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/worlds/gamerpotions-fps-test), ensuring consistent settings across different hardware setups.
Results captured using [CapFrameX](https://www.capframex.com/) for accurate frame time analysis.
Average FPS of 2400, never dropping below 800 FPS.
On an RTX 4090, we are seeing over 1200 FPS in vanilla terrain. With shaders enabled (Complimentary Reimagined), the pack maintains a solid 144 FPS.
